metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10095 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Dolibarr before 7.0.2 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via theforuserlogin parameter to adherents/cartes/carte.php.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
